name: Campanile Roissy Le Mesnil Amelot

reviews.text: I was stranded at Charles de Gaulle airport after missing a flight. This hotel was nearby and cheap. I was pleasantly surprised at the stylish, modern room. The restaurant is decent. Wifi is good. If I had another early-morning flight out of CDG, I would definitely go back here.
reviews.title: Perfect for an airport hotel

reviews.text: Good value for money for a overnight stay, modern hotel, I guess a certain Swedish retail firm has had a hand in putting the furniture in. Staff seem helpful and the food is as good as any of the other hotels in the area, just cheaper. WIFI is free but I was unable to connect to my works server, even with the USB modem, the signal was weak, but no problems surfing the internet. Unless your French is really good, you will be a bit stuck watching TV, no english channels and there is not a lot going on in the village. Therfore the tip is bring your laptop and that DVD you always intend to watch and you will be fine.
reviews.title: Good option for a over night stay

reviews.text: Overnight stay after flight from Asia. Hotel reception staff woman was pleasant but hotel room was very average with no rubbish bin and of average cleanliness. Alright for one night but no more.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: Ok so you want a good place with free shuttle and good price in the main Paris airport, then despite some issues this must be one of the best options around Charles de Gaulle Airport.
reviews.title: Good option for travelers on their way
I’m still recovering from the bed bugs bytes!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here one night after flying into CDG. Free airport shuttle, nice location with cute village to walk to/in, spotless, pleasant room with efficient use of space, delicious lunch with lots of vegetables, and best of all for us, an early check-in when we needed it after an overnight flight from the states.
reviews.title: Accomodating and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed one night to make it easier to catch the train the morning after flying in. This hotel has a free shuttle, which was great. It is very new, very clean, and has everything you will need. It isn't suitable if you are sightseeing in Paris..but for late arrivals or early departures this is perfect. I would certainly stay here again.
reviews.title: Great value for airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was comfortable and very clean in a new hotel. The ensuite bathroom was clean and functional. The shower worked well. The location near Charles de Gaulle airport was very good yet the room was quiet and at a good price. A very good hotel for travellers with early flights. The bed was comfortable. The free shuttle bus to and from the airport is a great advantage! The restaurant has reasonable food at a reasonable price. The staff were friendly and helpful. Only WiFi was available at hotel.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is great for a short stopover..Facilities were more than adequate. We just stayed for one night and we wanted to be close to CDG so the purpose was served. The hotel was easily accessible via shuttle from and to CDG. It was definitely above our expectation for the price we paid. The staff was helpful and pleasant.
reviews.title: Great for a stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel has only been open for a month and they are really trying to please. The front desk staff is very accommodating and works hard to help all guests. The rooms are larger than any other two star hotel and have great amenities including cable TV with CNN and a shower actually big enough for Americans. The buffet meals from breakfast to dinner and well presented with ALL food prepared on site including the morning bread and croissants.
reviews.title: A real find at CDG

likes.liked: — The front desk staff and the cleanliness as well as the space
likes.disliked: — The location, can be difficult to find

aka: Campanile Roissy Le Mesnil Amelot Hotel
